entry.def: A companionway is a staircase or ladder that leads from one deck to another on a ship.

means.word_mean: 1. a stairway or ladder that leads from one deck to another on a ship

auth_sentence.content: Passengers were urged to return below and sit in the companionway outside their rooms until the danger passed.
